Welcome To Our Project!
UNIQ, City Traffic Brain

Urban Network Intelligence for solving traffic Queues

Github Demo

Technology

UNIQ is the cloud-edge based City-traffic Brain technology that solves the traffic congestion problem.
Signal Optimization
Traffic optimization using artificial intelligence technology
Traffic Simulation
Cloud-based large-scale distributed processing
Cloud-Edge Technology
Cloud edge-based traffic analysis

Download

UNIQ Community

UNIQ is an open source project, mainly contributed by ETRI, KAIST, InnoGrid, RexGen, Neighbor Systems, Modutech, Daejeon City, and Sejong City.

Contact: mchung@etri.re.kr
Copyright © 2020-2024 UNIQ project. All Rights Reserved.
This work was supported by IITP grant funded by the Korean government (MSIT) (No. 2020- 0-00073, Development of Cloud-Edge-based City-Traffic Brain Technology).

We optimize traffic signal using the reinforcement learning technology.
